meanings.definition: Relating to or existing in the universe beyond our galaxy.
meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered a metagalactic object in deep space.
meanings.sent2: Studying metagalactic phenomena requires advanced telescopes.
meanings.sent3: The alien's metagalactic spaceship was too big to fit in the garage.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were as vast and metagalactic as the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The metagalactic journey through the cosmos left a lasting impression on the astronaut.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of phenomena on a cosmic scale.
meanings.sent1: The metagalactic research team analyzed data from distant galaxies.
meanings.sent2: Cosmologists use metagalactic theories to understand the universe.
meanings.sent3: The metagalactic conference attracted scientists from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared to metagalactic heights as she pondered the universe.
meanings.sent5: The metagalactic view of the cosmos was both awe-inspiring and humbling.
